storyInfo: The Matriarch invites Andoain to participate in greater things for the Shrine of Nurtury. Exusiai is arrested for attempting to sabotage the Nativity, and all the non-Sankta are taken away by gun-knights under various pretexts.

attributes.content: Such a sound... do not fear, child.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Matriarch.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You too, Nurturer. Thank you for your work.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I simply did what I could.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The child is still weak. Take him back to his mother, Andoain.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I will come and find you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You seem unwell, Matriarch. Should I escort you to your apartments?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I am fine. The heartbeat continues to echo within me.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Not just the mother. I can hear countless hearts resonating, so powerful it seems they could bring down this shrine.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The people have begun to link with one another, irrespective of race or background... but some have rejected the future we revealed.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The Nativity has come to an end. Our kindred need not stay here. We should prepare for the next stage.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Understood. You should retire. I will take care of the rest.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Once again, welcome to the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Whether you understood the Matriarch's proposal at the summit, and regardless of what you think of it, the birth and enlightenment of this arborbeast is undoubtedly a clear revelation.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: On how to remove the barriers between nations and races... on how to resolve hatred and build lasting peace... on facing the calamity that hangs over our heads together.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Beginning with the Nativity, the second Summit of Nations now enters a new stage—
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Laterano will share our halo with all races!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: 'May our Lord share the blessings with all.'
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fiammetta! Mostima! Over here!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Lemuel?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: When did you come back? Why didn't you tell us?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Nice outfit, huh? Including those handcuffs...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I wanted to surprise you. Well... hee hee.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Scratches head)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What happened, Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: ...It's a long story.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I could buy you two minutes, if you want to make a break for it.
attributes.name: Mostima
Exusiai
attributes.content: Sure—

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: On second thought, maybe next time. I've caused enough trouble for my sister already.
attributes.joined: Sure—On second thought, maybe next time. I've caused enough trouble for my sister already.

attributes.content: Did I interrupt a reunion?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Velliv.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can you take the suspect to the Seventh Tribunal on your own, Cardinal Lemuen?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Or do you need support? After all, attempted sabotage of the Shrine of Nurtury and Summit of Nations is a serious charge.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: If you're concerned, you are free to come with us, or have a gun-knight keep watch.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Don't talk like that. After all, according to your conclavist Cardinal Aide Amos's testimony, you picked up Lemuel's trail at another scene beforehand...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Are you saying I tried to cover for my sister?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, not exactly. All the evidence is circumstantial, and there is nothing that proves you did anything wrong.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Do you recall our previous conversation in the Shrine?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I admire your ability and resolve greatly, Lemuen the Silent. But I also know when these virtues of yours are most prominently displayed.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Besides, it's natural for us to be cautious when your sister is involved. I hope you understand.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No need to worry. Letting El run around with all these charges against her won't help her.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of course. I'm sure the misunderstanding can be resolved, as long as Lemuel cooperates.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: One moment, Shimmering Vigil... and Legatus Mostima.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Please remain here at the Shrine of Nurtury. The Curia has a mission for you.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: They... took El away?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: After all the effort it took for Magister to get me off the hook...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Come on, Vani... isn't there anything else you can do?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Don't bother knocking, Andoain. I have nothing to hide from you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The mother?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Sleeping.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I brought the child. His feathers are not yet grown in, but he is surprisingly lively. I thought perhaps you might want to pet him again.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Thank you. It is comforting to me.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This place...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Do you remember? We built it to house the mother when we came to Laterano. It became the first nursery of the shrine.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I remember. We made this simple yet warm bed together, and hung the comfort bells that gave her restful sleep.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The room is no longer in use, but I come back from time to time, if only for prayer.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This was our starting point, yours and mine.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: (Stretches happily)
attributes.name: Arborbeast

attributes.content: I sense that he likes this place too.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: His halo is so bright. I noticed it the moment you brought him here.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: It is the miracle that you have long believed in.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But I don't understand. What brought on the premonitions of the miracle when you first encountered the mother?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I had no premonitions, Andoain, I only saw your struggling heart.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: She was on her last legs, and what she needed was not healing, but her last rites. Yet you wanted to save her, and you would not allow the idea to be dispelled by common sense.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I believed that this thought, which you protected so dearly, could create the miracle of life.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Life is a wonderful thing, one that can never be measured by the confines of common sense.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Anyone would want to save her, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Therefore, anyone can create miracles. Miracles are so because people do not believe in the power of faith.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Is it the halo that gives Sankta faith, or faith that gives Sankta the halo? Have you ever pondered it?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Our Law, empathy, and firearms, and the Paradise that we built atop them...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Did they all arise from a blessing without a cause, as common sense would indicate?
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The past has its beginnings, as does the future.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury... This towering edifice was not built in a day. It began as a simple, ordinary nursery.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Our nursery...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Did we start with the blueprints of such an imposing shrine? No. We merely wished for a safe, comfortable room for that mother...
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: And yet, its frenzied evolution led to what it is now.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: That is how a future where all are saved can sprout from our faith.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Matriarch... I followed you because I had long searched for such a future, and you happened to know the way.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But I never thought, nor could I comprehend, why you believed it could begin with me.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What I'm able to do is, ultimately, insignificant.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Insignificant trifles and grandiose feats are but a hair's breadth from one another. You have labored for many years over this grueling journey of yours. You should not let such a meaningless difference stay your steps.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I will need you to lift your spirits, for aside from caring for this mother and child, there are more deeds that must be done... such as the next Nativity.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: You're early.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I'm already packed. You can just stick the seals on top so I can go back to bed.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Patrizion?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Hmph. I thought you were him.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I was told the last part of the handover would be handled by the Notarial Hall. Why did they send gun-knights?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: That was assuming nothing had been tampered with.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Both the storage room and equipment show signs of recent use.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Cardinal Aide Amos must have made it clear when he last came here—
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: All gunsmithing operations were to cease immediately upon signing the papers. Any unauthorized work on patron firearms or explosives would be a violation of law.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: I've had this little workshop for decades. I couldn't let it go so easily...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I just wanted to hear these old boys move again one last time and shed some tears over it. Is that so wrong?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You've already said as much.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Your apprentice, Vannini, the one you took with you from the Shrine of Nurtury—where is she?
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Must've gone back to watch the Nativity.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: She's not a kid anymore. Besides, I don't see so well. Can't keep an eye on her all the time.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: In that case, let us continue this conversation somewhere else.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: What if I don't want to?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I do not wish to resort to force, unless absolutely necessary.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: It was Patrizion who sent you here, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: S-Sister Hildegard, Reverend Gun-Knight?
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: Is she not in the monastery?
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Y-Yes, but... she just had an accident. She's resting now.
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: It's hard to explain...
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: A mobile confessional suddenly showed up at the monastery yesterday. Sister Hildegard was lying inside, unconscious...
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: There was no one else; someone had set the confessional's navigation system to bring her here. We're not sure what happened to her.
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: Perhaps we can have her report to you once she wakes up.
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: This is urgent. Bring me to her.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... It's alright, Sister Gerain.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Hildegard! You're awake? The porridge...
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: I'm fine, just a little dizzy.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I ate the porridge on the table. I'm coughing because some of it went down the wrong pipe.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Reverend Gun-Knight, you came for Arturia, didn't you?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Yes, it's true that Arturia left Landen Monastery without permission...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: But I went after her as soon as I found out! And I caught her! But something unexpected happened...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Please, give Landen Monastery a little more time... no, give me a little more time.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: We would like you to come with us, Sister Hildegard.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Well... alright.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: It would be best if you came too, Sister.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Nervous Nun

attributes.content: Sister Gerain doesn't have anything to do with this.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I was the one in charge of supervising Arturia. This is my fault...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: No need to worry, Sister Hildegard.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: With a major incident like this, the Curia needs as much information as we can get.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Now, follow me, please.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight
